question: Who will represent India at the 67th Miss Universe 2018 pageant in Bangkok?
explanation: Nehal Chudasama from Mumbai has been crowned the Yamaha Fascino Miss Diva - Miss Universe India 2018 at a star-studded grand finale event in Mumbai. Now, she will represent at the 67th Miss Universe 2018 pageant, which is scheduled to be held in Bangkok, Thailand on 16th December 2018. At the same event, Aditi Hundia from Jaipur was crowned as Miss Diva - Supranational 2018 and Roshni Sheoran was crowned as Runner-up.
